channel.title: Crowdin on Karim Semmoud Personal Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Crowdin on Karim Semmoud Personal Blog

item.title: Phoenix Gettext & Crowdin
item.description: PhoenixCrowdin This reposiory is an example on managed translations using Phoenix framework Gettext Plugs Tests Prerequise Elixir and Phoenix installed ASDF NPM Github Account Crowdin Account Run Locally # Clone this repository git clone https://github.com/karim-semmoud/phoenix-crowdin.git # Enter the project folder cd phoenix-crowdin # install Erlang and Elixir correct versions asdf install # install and setup dependencies mix deps.get # install Flowbite cd assets npm install # run tests mix test # Start Phoenix endpoint with mix phx.
